question: Who is the author of the book 'Matoshree'?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has recently released a book \'Matoshree\', authored by Lok Sabha Speaker Sumitra Mahajan in New Delhi on April 11, 2017. The book \'Matoshree\' covers the life and times of legendary Devi Ahilyabai Holker who ruled the Holkar Empire spread over the Malwa region from 1767 to 1795. Ahilyabai Holkar was a very able ruler and organizer, highly respected during her lifetime and considered as a saint by people after her death. She is remembered and worshipped by people for her exemplary governance, sense of justice and fairness.
